task: Define a variable to store the result of a temperature conversion.
code:
```go
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    var temperatureInFahrenheit float64 = 98.6
    var temperatureInCelsius float64

    temperatureInCelsius = (temperatureInFahrenheit - 32) * 5 / 9

    fmt.Printf("Temperature in Celsius: %.2f\n", temperatureInCelsius)
}
```

task: Define a variable to store the details of a meeting schedule.
code:
```go
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    var meetingSchedule struct {
        title    string
        date     string
        time     string
        location string
    }

    meetingSchedule.title = "Project Kickoff"
    meetingSchedule.date = "2023-10-25"
    meetingSchedule.time = "10:00 AM"
    meetingSchedule.location = "Main Conference Room"

    fmt.Println("Meeting Schedule:")
    fmt.Println("Title:", meetingSchedule.title)
    fmt.Println("Date:", meetingSchedule.date)
    fmt.Println("Time:", meetingSchedule.time)
    fmt.Println("Location:", meetingSchedule.location)
}
```
